description: This is an HTML file for a web-based database visualizer interface, including embedded CSS and JavaScript for UI rendering and data fetching.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Triggers a refresh of the database list and resets the UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs the HTML table based on fetched data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content with handling for long text, nulls, and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better viewing of long or object data.
